articles.title: Premier League sets out plans to tackle spate of pitch invasions - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY MIKE KEEGAN: Each side has been told they need to use 'pitch runners', whose sole purpose is to keep an eye out for fans who encroach the playing surface.
articles.content:
The Premier League has set out plans to tackle pitch invaders at an emergency meeting which include the use of specially trained sprinter stewards wearing football boots.

articles.author: Matt Barlow
articles.title: Chelsea: Antonio Rudiger reveals the reason he is leaving amid links to Real Madrid - Daily Mail
articles.description: INTERVIEW BY MATT BARLOW: It was March when Antonio Rudiger, decided this season would be his last at Chelsea - after contract talks stalled for five months.
articles.content:
It was March, explains Antonio Rudiger, when he finally decided this season would be his last at Chelsea.
Having started it with no desire to leave, 'definitely not', he was surprised when unresolve… [+11109 chars]
